titles: By the King. A proclamation to restrain the spreading of false news, and licentious talking of matters of state and government.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

notes: Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall, the 11th day of June, in the 24th year of Our Reign. 1672.
